resources.name: places_100
resources.description: Sample file of 100 places visited on the web

fields.name: datetime
fields.description: An ISO8601 format string e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ in UTC time

fields.name: description
fields.description: A standard (e.g. from META) description of the visited resource

fields.name: image_url
fields.description: Link to an image file which previews or thumbnails this resource

fields.name: category
fields.description: Category of this resource, if known, e.g. entertainment

fields.name: is_risky
fields.description: True if this has been matched to a blacklist of risky sites

fields.name: is_verified
fields.description: True if this resource has been matched to a whitelist of verified sites

name: t2da
title: Tracks to Digital Awareness
description: Container for anonymized representations of tracks taken through users through digital services, initially web browser histories, developed for an open data hackday.
